A classic philosophical analysis! 😊

The statement "每个人的快乐对他来说都是好的，因此，一般的快乐也是所有人的快乐的集合" can be translated to "Each person's happiness is good for them, therefore, general happiness is the collection of all people's happiness."

This statement is an example of the "组合谬误" (Combination Fallacy), also known as the "Summation Fallacy".
